item.title: Return Air Grille – All Cargo Configuration

remarks.para: One may be broken or missing provided:

numlitem.para: Broken or missing grille is located within a designated area, and
Alternate procedures are established and used to cover grille.

placard.para: Placard next to upper EICAS screen "RETURN AIR GRILLE AT STA ____ BLOCKED" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: One Return Air Grille may be blocked off only in the following area. (No other Return Air Grille may be blocked off):
-STA 1260 to 1360 both left and right sides.

numlitem.para: Damages such as dents, cracks (minor nature) and cosmetic conditions that do not allow any object larger than the nominal screen vent hole size to pass thru into the air return box area are acceptable for normal operation.

Severe damages that can allow objects larger than the nominal screen vent holes to pass thru into the air return box area, cause damage to personnel or equipment, or prevent the Return Air Grille from performing as intended, must be corrected.
One severely damaged or missing Return Air Grille located in the designated area may be blocked off with speed tape or a panel that completely covers the grille area using standard SRM procedures.
